Rules
property.value: As long as it's your turn, outlaws you control have first strike. (Assassins, Mercenaries, Pirates, Rogues, and Warlocks are outlaws.) This ability triggers only once each turn.

property.value: The cactusfolk were a young culture, but they already knew the pains of death and joys of birth.

You may choose new targets for the copy. When you lose the flip, Breeches, the Blastmaker deals damage equal to that spell's mana value to any target.

property.value: "I find a world where the herds finally listen to me, but now the plants have an attitude?"
